name: pdf-paraparatrans2
postCreateCommand: git config --local filter.lfs.required false && git config --local filter.lfs.clean "cat" && git config --local filter.lfs.smudge "cat" && git config --local filter.lfs.process "" && git config --local --unset lfs.repositoryformatversion || true && python -m pip install -U pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
